archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Customer Reference Data Management
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Description: Maintain customer reference information
Control record: Customer contact details (name/role/address/contact numbers/email), Customer known relationships and associations (partners, associations, family, dependents), Customer demographics/properties (socio/economic, nationality, age, qualifications...), Customer education/employment history, Customer bank relationship history (member since, product activity/usage extract summaries), Customer known location/address history, etcâ€¦
